item.title: ::xteleall command help
item.dc:creator: @alancarr123 alancarr123
item.description:
@alancarr123 wrote:

Oh yeah soz.
its public void teleall() { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { if (p != null) { client person = (client) p; if ((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")) { person.toX = absX; person.toY = absY; person.heightLevel = heightLevel; person.sM("Mass teleport to " + playerName); person.updateRequired = true; person.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } } }

Read full topic

item.title: ::xteleall command help
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

client.java:7392: 'try' without 'catch' or 'finally'

I’m pretty sure that means that you have a code that might throw an exception, but you don’t have a catch that handles then exception that is thrown.

Read full topic

item.title: ::xteleall command help
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“xteleall”) && playerRights >= 3) {

                String otherPName = command.substring(8); 
                int otherPIndex = server.playerHandler.players(otherPIndex); {
     } else {

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {    
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                    if (!IsInFightCave() && !p.IsInFightCave()) {                                                
                    p.toX = absX;
                    p.toY = absY;
                    p.heightLevel = heightLevel;
                    p.updateRequired = true;
                    p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                    p.sM(
                            "You have been teleported to "+playerName+".");
            }
        }[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: ::xteleall command help
item.dc:creator: @bbl111 bbl111
item.description:
@bbl111 wrote:

Hey guys I’m trying to make a xteleall command from scratch and this is what i came up with.

[code] if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“xteleall”) && playerRights >= 3) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(8);
int otherPIndex = server.playerHandler.players(otherPIndex); {

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {    
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                    if (!IsInFightCave() && !p.IsInFightCave()) {                                                
                    p.toX = absX;
                    p.toY = absY;
                    p.heightLevel = heightLevel;
                    p.updateRequired = true;
                    p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                    p.sM(
                            "You have been teleported to "+playerName+".");
            }
        }[/code]

Yeh and when I compile I come up with 2 errors 1 which has to deal with the code and 1 that doesn’t

client.java:7392: 'try' without 'catch' or 'finally' try { - which has to do with the code

and…

client.java:7406: 'else' without 'if' } else { which doesn’t have to do with the code My source is ddsspeced and when I remove the xteleall code both errors disappear any help here?

Read full topic
